basics.name: Freddy W Henin
basics.label: .NET/Mobile Developer
basics.summary: 5 years of experience in all stages of Web and software development lifecycle, from concept and development through quality assurance (QA) and tuning.In-depth understanding of security, SEO, and optimization to maximize site performance.Extensive knowledge and on-hands experience in information architecture, web design, project management, and testing.Proven background in large-scale enterprise application implementations. Superior communication, analytical, and interpersonal skills.

highlights: Lead and Build an iOS application from the ground up
Develop and Maintain a Dealership Management Software
Discovered and fixed efficiency bottlenecks to speed up certain parts of the system
Worked with a team of developers to efficiently solve problems
Develop websites using relative programming languages
Develop custom themes and templates for Wordpress
Met with prospective clients informing them what MLS can offer
Self-Taught modern programming skills in HTML5 and CSS3

work.summary: In a matter of 9 months at Empyra, I've went from Entry-Level Developer to Senior-Level with Team Lead responsibilities. My knowledge and passion in programming allowed me tolearn quickly and catch up to the Empyra OneFlow system.
highlights: Develop and enhanced features of the OneFlow web program
Mentor entry-level developers and train them to understand OneFlow's n-tier architecture
Discovered and fixed efficiency bottlenecks to speed up certain parts of the system
Worked with a team of developers to efficiently solve problems
Brand the Church using Video, Audio, Website and Mobile Apps
Delegate creative work to a design team
Handle all Technology as related to Audio, Video, and Lighting
Develop websites using relative programming languages

references.name: Travis Alexander
references.reference: Most professionals in the software development world understand that exceptional developers who also possess outstanding interpersonal skills are too often few and far between. Not only does Freddy possess technical competence, he is a terrific communicator and teacher. This truly grants him the ability to effectively serve as a team-lead and liaison between technical resources and project managers. Freddy is a passionate software developer and a person of strong character. I enthusiastically endorse him for any cause where creativity, competence and commitment are prized!

references.name: Matthew Beda
references.reference: I had the privilege of working alongside Freddy while at Empyra. He was the major force behind our first IOS app, and helped to institute several key changes to our web application structure. He always looked for a better way to do things, and he enjoyed learning new programming structures.
